## Application.setupShutdown() method

Set up signals that are captured to shutdown the application

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected setupShutdown(): (signal: string) => Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

(signal: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;
